description:
Want to carry more stuff on your bikepacking steed? Add this cradle to your bars and strap on an extra drybag. This compact cradle secures via integrated silicone coated straps that cinch up with a 5mm Allen key. The cradle is tailor made for a small dry bag or sleeping back stuff sack, and can be rotated, so you can customize your rack to your gear, or your bike.

  • Integrated straps secure your cargo and have a clean, svelte look
  • All touchpoints are protected with a silicone coating to keep your bike looking great
  • Cradle can be mounted inline with the bars or rotated up to 90° (with a 5mm Allen key)
  • Constructed from stainless steel, anodized aluminium, glass reinforced nylon and silicone coated straps
  • Load capacity 5kg
name: Aeroe Spider Handlebar Cradle
